select
from app_resource where PARENT_RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY DISPLAY_ORDER ASC
select MAX(RESOURCE_ID) from app_resource where PARENT_RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
